pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fitting the Centered Autologistic and Sparse Spatial Generalized Linear Mixed Models for Areal Data // Provides tools for analyzing spatial data, especially non-Gaussian areal data. The current version supports the sparse spatial generalized linear mixed model of Hughes and Haran (2013) DOI:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2012.01041.x and the centered autologistic model of Caragea and Kaiser (2009) DOI:10.1198/jabes.2009.07032.
